title: Home for Christmas
description: Short story and sampler. Joseph and Danni were college friends who abandoned their relationship after a flash-hot affair one Christmas weekend. When their paths cross again on another snowy Christmas Eve, fate gives them a rare second chance. Can they push beyond past hurt and finally find a home with each other for Christmas?NOTE FROM THE AUTHOR: This e-book is designed to give you a quick, satisfying read along with two 3-chapter samples of other books I've written so you can try out my writing for FREE.
author: Carol Burnside
